inclusion.criterion: Male and female liver transplant recipients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signed, written informed consent prior to randomization
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are recipients of multiple solid organ or islet cell tissue transplants
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with renal failure or CKD/ESRD who require renal replacement therapy for more than 2 weeks prior to transplantation.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of coagulopathy and medical condition requiring long-term treatment, but this is not explicitly stated as an exclusion criterion.
